com.google.android.exoplayer2.trackselection

Class TrackSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.trackselection.TrackSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MappingTrackSelector

    public abstract class TrackSelector
extends Object
    Selects tracks to be consumed by available renderers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  TrackSelector.InvalidationListener
      Notified when previous selections by a TrackSelector are no longer valid.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public final void init(TrackSelector.InvalidationListener listener)
        Initializes the selector.
        Parameters:
        listener - A listener for the selector.

      • selectTracks

        public abstract TrackSelectorResult selectTracks(RendererCapabilities[] rendererCapabilities,
                                                 TrackGroupArray trackGroups)
                                          throws ExoPlaybackException
        Performs a track selection for renderers.
        Parameters:
        rendererCapabilities - The RendererCapabilities of the renderers for which tracks are to be selected.
        trackGroups - The available track groups.
        Returns:
        A TrackSelectorResult describing the track selections.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs selecting tracks.

      • onSelectionActivated

        public abstract void onSelectionActivated(Object info)
        Called when a TrackSelectorResult previously generated by selectTracks(RendererCapabilities[], TrackGroupArray) is activated.
        Parameters:
        info - The value of TrackSelectorResult.info in the activated result.

      • invalidate

        protected final void invalidate()
        Invalidates all previously generated track selections.
